list.abs: ...MP是XHTML的子集，在XHTML MP出现之前，WAP网站的开发者们只能用WML和WML script来创建WAP的网站。而与此同时，web的开发者们却在用强大得多的HTML、CSS、XHTML等来进行传统网站的开发。所以XHTML MP的目标就是浏览者在WAP和web上获得尽可能相似的浏览体.

entry.def: A mark-up is an increase in the price of something, for example the difference between its cost and the price that it is sold for.

means.word_mean: 1. the amount added to the cost to determine the asking price
2. detailed stylistic instructions for typesetting something that is to be printed; manual markup is usually written on the copy (e.g. underlining words that are to be set in italics)
